contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[island]]s of [[Finland]]'''. Within [[Finland]]'s borders there are 789 islands of over 1 km<sup>2</sup> area. Most of these are inhabited, and with a road connection to the mainland. There are 455 permanently inhabited islands in Finland with no road connection to mainland. Many other islands are used nearly permanently for recreational purposes. Smaller isles number in tens of thousands. {{Expand list|date=August 2008}} *[[Åland Islands]] *[[Bengtskär]] *[[Björkö (Korsholm)]] *[[Emäsalo]] *[[Enonsaari]] *[[Fasta Åland]] *[[Hailuoto]] *[[Harmaja]] *[[Hirvensalo]] *[[Houtskär]] *[[Iniö]] *[[Islands of Turku]] *[[Jurmo]] *[[Jussarö]] *[[Kakskerta]] *[[Kataja]] *[[Kimitoön (island)|Kimitoön]] (Kemiönsaari) *[[Koivusaari]] *[[Kökar]] *[[Kokkosaari]] *[[Korkeasaari]] *[[Korpo]] *[[Kråkö]] *[[Kuivasaari]] *[[Kulosaari]] *[[Kustavi]] *[[Kvarken]] *[[Kytö]] *[[Laajasalo]] *[[Lauttasaari]] *[[Lohjansaari]] *[[Luonnonmaa]] *[[Mäkiluoto]] *[[Maly Vysotsky Island]] *[[Märket]] *[[Mulkkusaaret]] *[[Nagu]] *[[Öja (island)]] *[[Otava (island)]] *[[Pellinki]] *[[Pihlajasaari]] *[[Replot|Raippaluoto (Replot)]] *[[Reposaari]] *[[Ruissalo]] *[[Rymättylä]] *[[Sääminginsalo]] *[[Santahamina]] *[[Särkisalo]] *[[Satava]] *[[Seurasaari]] *[[Själö]] *[[Soisalo]] *[[Storlandet]] *[[Suomenlinna]] *[[Suvisaaristo]] *[[Säppi]] *[[Tammisalo]] *[[Ukonkivi]] *[[Utö, Finland]] *[[Valsörarna]] *[[Väski]] *[[Velkua]] *[[Vessölandet]] ==See also== * [[List of islands in the Baltic Sea]] * [[List of islands]] * [[Archipelago Sea]] == References == {{Reflist}} {{Finland topics}} {{Europe topic|List of islands of}} [[Category:Islands of Finland|*]] [[Category:Lists of islands by country|Finland]] [[Category:Lists of landforms of Finland|Islands]] {{Finland-geo-stub}}
